member.remarks: Image file will be opened in FileMode.Open mode.

A FileMode constant that determines how to open or create the image file.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2File.SaveChanges(Vintasoft.Imaging.Utils.IProgressController)
member.summary: Saves changes of this JBIG2 file to the current source of the image file.
member.param: Progress controller.
member.exception: Thrown if file is open in read-only mode and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2File.SaveChanges(System.String,Vintasoft.Imaging.Utils.IProgressController)
member.summary: Saves changes of this JBIG2 file to specified file.
member.param: The filename to save the image file.
Progress controller.
member.exception: Thrown if filename is null.
Thrown if filename is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
Thrown if the caller does not have the required permission.
Thrown if the specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
Thrown if the access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path, such as when the file or directory is set for read-only access.

Thrown if the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length. For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
member.remarks: This method saves changes to specified file and makes this file as current source of the image file. Previous source of the image file is closed without save changes.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2File.SaveChanges(System.IO.Stream,Vintasoft.Imaging.Utils.IProgressController)
member.summary: Saves changes of this JBIG2 file to specified stream.
member.param: Stream to save the image file.
Progress controller.
member.exception: Thrown if stream is null.
member.remarks: This method saves changes to specified stream and makes this stream as current source of the image file. Previous source of the image file is closed without save changes.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2File.Save(System.String,Vintasoft.Imaging.Utils.IProgressController)
member.summary: Saves this JBIG2 file to specified file.
member.param: The filename to save the image file.
Progress controller.
member.exception: Thrown if filename is null.
Thrown if filename is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
Thrown if the caller does not have the required permission.
Thrown if the specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
Thrown if the access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path, such as when the file or directory is set for read-only access.

Thrown if the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length. For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
member.remarks: This method saves changes to specified file. Current source of the image file is not changed.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2File.Save(System.IO.Stream,Vintasoft.Imaging.Utils.IProgressController)
member.summary: Saves this JBIG2 file to specified stream.
member.param: Stream to save the image file.
Progress controller.
member.exception: Thrown if stream is null.
member.remarks: This method saves changes to specified stream. Current source of the image file is not changed.

member.summary: Packs the image file and saves to specified file.

Progress controller.
member.remarks: This methods saves the image file to specified file and removes unused space from the image file.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2Page
member.summary: Represents a page of JBIG2 file.

Class allows to:
get information about image associated with this page (width, height, bits per pixel, palette, resolution, compression)
get image associated with this page
save image associated with this page in the image file

member.returns: The image associated with this Jbig2Page object if image was loaded successfully; null if image loading was canceled.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jbig2.Jbig2PageCollection
member.summary: Represents a page collection of JBIG2 file.
member.remarks:
Class allows to:
get an object associated with selected page
add an object as a JBIG2 page to the multipage JBIG2 file
insert an object as a JBIG2 page into the multipage JBIG2 file
delete JBIG2 page from the multipage JBIG2 file
Instance of this class cannot be created directly, it can be received only from the object.
